Package views

Class mainMenuController

  • java.lang.Object
    • views.mainMenuController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.fxml.Initializable
    public class mainMenuController
extends java.lang.Object
implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
    This class controls the main menu of the application.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void addAppointment​(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      This method is called when the user clicks the add appointment button, and it takes the user to the add appointment page.
      void addCustomer​(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      This method is called when the suer clicks the add customer button, and it takes the user to the add customer page.
      void deleteAppointment​(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      This method deletes an appointment from the all appointments list and from the database if the user selected an appointment.
      void deleteAppointments​(javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointment> appointmentList)
      This method deletes all the appointments a customer has before the customer is deleted.
      void deleteCustomer​(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      This method deletes a customer and any appointments the customer has if the user selects a customer.
      void initialize​(java.net.URL url, java.util.ResourceBundle resourceBundle)
      This method is called every time the user is sent to the main menu and populates the table with all the scheduled appointments.
      void modifyAppointment​(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      This method takes the user to the modify appointment page if the user selected an appointment and displays an error message if the user did not select an appointment.
      void modifyCustomer​(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      This method takes the user to the modify customer page if the user selected a customer and displays an error message if the user did not select a customer.
      void onAll​(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      This method is called when the user selects the all appointments radio button, and it displays all the scheduled appointments.
      void onMonthly​(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      This method is called when the user selects the monthly radio button, and it displays all the appointments that are in the current month.
      void onWeekly​(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      This method is called when the user selects the weekly radio button, and it displays all the appointments that are in the current week.
      void toReports​(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      This method takes the user to the reports page of the application and is called when the user presses the reports button from the main menu.
      void viewCustomers​(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      This method is called when the user clicks the customers radio button, and it changes the table to display all the customers.

    • Method Detail

      • initialize

        public void initialize​(java.net.URL url,
                       java.util.ResourceBundle resourceBundle)
        This method is called every time the user is sent to the main menu and populates the table with all the scheduled appointments. The first time it is called it displays a message saying if there are any upcoming appointments or not. It does not indicate if there are upcoming appointments after the first time the method is called.
        Specified by:
        initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable

      • addAppointment

                    throws java.io.IOException
        This method is called when the user clicks the add appointment button, and it takes the user to the add appointment page.
        Parameters:
        actionEvent - method is called when the user presses the add appointment button.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • modifyAppointment

        public void modifyAppointment​(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
                       throws java.io.IOException
        This method takes the user to the modify appointment page if the user selected an appointment and displays an error message if the user did not select an appointment.
        Parameters:
        actionEvent - method is called when the user presses the modify appointment button.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • deleteAppointment

        public void deleteAppointment​(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
                       throws java.sql.SQLException
        This method deletes an appointment from the all appointments list and from the database if the user selected an appointment. The method displays an error message if the user did not select an appointment. It also displays a confirmation message.
        Parameters:
        actionEvent - method is called when the user presses the delete appointment button.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException

      • modifyCustomer

        public void modifyCustomer​(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
                    throws java.io.IOException
        This method takes the user to the modify customer page if the user selected a customer and displays an error message if the user did not select a customer.
        Parameters:
        actionEvent - method is called when the user presses the modify customer button.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • deleteCustomer

        public void deleteCustomer​(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
                    throws java.io.IOException,
                           java.sql.SQLException
        This method deletes a customer and any appointments the customer has if the user selects a customer. An error message is displayed if the user did not select a customer. It also displays a confirmation message.
        Parameters:
        actionEvent - method is called when the user presses the delete customer button.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        java.sql.SQLException

      • deleteAppointments

        public void deleteAppointments​(javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointment> appointmentList)
                        throws java.sql.SQLException
        This method deletes all the appointments a customer has before the customer is deleted.
        Parameters:
        appointmentList - method takes in a list holding all the appointments a customer has and deletes each of those appointments.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException

      • toReports

        public void toReports​(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
               throws java.io.IOException
        This method takes the user to the reports page of the application and is called when the user presses the reports button from the main menu.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
